PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-02422012-03-01,  ,  ,  JUS, 
ActJudges Act
SubjectGrace Halperin ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Irving J. Halperin
PrecisGranting of an annuity to GRACE HALPERIN, widow of the Hon. Irving J. Halperin, a Puisne Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec, effective December 10, 2011.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Grace Halperin ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY **  The Hon. Irving J. Halperin
precis: Granting of an annuity to GRACE HALPERIN, widow of the Hon. Irving J. Halperin, a Puisne Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec, effective December 10, 2011.
